sentences.en: The exigencies of forming may make it necessary to mismanage a pasture.
sentences.cn: 生产过程中的突发性事件可能会迫使采取不适当的草场管理措施.

sentences.en: The nation’s finances had been badly mismanaged.
sentences.cn: 国家的金融管理非常混乱。

trans.tran_cn: 对…管理不善，对…经营不当
trans.tran_en: if someone mismanages something they are in charge of, they deal with or manage it badly
